This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/us-core-tags defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
sdoh SDOHSocial Determinants of Health Category

name: USCoreTagsCodeSystem
title: US Core Tags CodeSystem
description: Codes used in US Core `meta.tag` and 'category' profiles. The are typically used when there is a need for categorization or workflow hints.
